WRITING.TITLE: What if seeing yourself through societies perspective has some sort of correlation with mental disorders?
WRITING.TEXT: That's why celebrities often go "wonky" especially if they started young. Perhaps that's the reason why mental disorders are hitting new highs as people are constantly viewing themselves this way thanks to modern social media culture.

WRITING.TITLE: Million Dollar Movie Idea (bold title that promises to deliver)
WRITING.TEXT:
Takes place in a community from the future. Not futuristic but in terms of timing/ foreshadowing. Similar to "The Hunger Games" or "Divergent". It is a society that lives by a set of governing rules that ensure what happened in the past doesn't happen again. The "Present" society is a very modernized, advanced version of the first, primitive times of humans like tribes for example. The movie plot involves a young group of kids challenging the views and wanting to privatize human needs like water, food, etc. they learn lessons throughout their greed journey that cite the "barbaric" times when those were the exact things that put humanity at risk of extinction.... then some trippy shit happens and people watching it *gasp* in awe.
Sorry, pretty high.
If you put the head where you attached the tail, you will have achieved the Soulja dog version.
Seen one been used once on the tv, that's as far as our relationship goes.
Acceptance, that's a step right?
Did you cut all sugar from your diet? More specifically like sweet snacks/treats?
This makes a lot of sense. Thank you! :)

WRITING.TITLE: What is the impact microwaving has on food nutrients?
WRITING.TEXT: I have always felt uneasy about microwaves and I came a cross a post online saying that microwaving food eliminates all the nutrients. How true is this? Someone? Anyone?

1. Plan and save for something big 2. Spend it all and have fun Regardless know what your plan is. When I was making money at 16 I had the same thought as this and before I knew I had zero idea where my money actually went!
I'll be glad to give them back now that this sale is taking place!
I eat literally the same thing only with the addition of a banana that I use as my oatmeal sweetener!

WRITING.TITLE: Killer Declines Last Meal Before Execution, Consumed Something Else Instead | Holy Communion

WRITING.TEXT: Awesome! Thank you
Does the brand of B12 make a difference? Like will the dollar general brand be worse or less effective than I pricier one?
Be careful, seems to work too good
Can someone help me out? What island is this? I wanna see lava before I die and this is a pretty doable destination. Much love for lava

Have you tried changing your environment? I felt the exact same until I moved to Washington, then it was like a new surge of want! Seeing the same thing/ people your whole life I feel like can contribute to that mindset.

Flat out being 17 sucks! I remember I had never felt more stress in my life then 17-18. I didn't get it, they teach you so much random stuff in school but never teach you how to manage yourself. I'd say do something you can invest time into. Maybe something you and your mom can do together. I'm not sure how I got over my mind at that age I just know I didn't feel "calm" for about a year. Try your best not to overthink too, I know it's hard but that was my worst enemy going through stress/ confusion.

That is some good advice. I always crumble when I make one bad choice for the day but thinking about it in terms of segments is actually a really really good idea. The guilt makes everything harder and I hope this way of thinking helps me, thank you!
Yes that's a perfect way of putting it!! I could be so full and I just was to keep chewing on something! For some reason gum doesn't meet my chewing needs.
Oh yes I have a solid health insurance plan through my dad luckily but I am in an unbelievably tiny town in the Midwest with no car so physically reaching a professional is the challenging part
sadly I don't have much available to me as far as professional help. Do you think I could work through things in my own?
Don't have much available especially since I live in a very small town but I think talking to someone would help

I love to cook but being a college student athlete it's very hard to have motivation to cook for every meal all the time but now that you mention it, making a pizza like that sounds much better than the 2 inch dough, 2 inch cheese thing at the store.
Seeing a therapist would be very difficult as far as cultural aspects and my parents not really seeing mental illnesses past the stray jacket stereotype. Do you think meditation could help?
Awesome! I think gradual changes is a big missing key for me. I think I am a bit impatient with this which makes it a lot harder. Do you think meditation could help?

WRITING.TITLE: Realized I CANNOT do it alone
WRITING.TEXT: Alright so I had this long thing typed out but I realized it wasn't capturing the main point haha so here is the main point. I want to eat healthy but I always cave. I will go 5 days eating really amazing good foods then go 7 days eating absolutely terrible (like a whole box of brownies and whole pizza to myself in a night type of thing). Of course I always feel so terrible about myself when I eat bad and I feel so amazing and confident when I eat good. I want to stop doing this up/down thing. I need to find a way to control myself. It feels like I need to be chewing like I need to be eating even if I am so close to puking because of how much I have eaten. No matter what I still have the urge to eat. I need help controlling myself and I need help staying on a consistent diet. Please guys any advice helps, it's starting to really impact my mental health and I'm getting somewhere I've never been before. That's why I decided I can't do this alone anymore, I need help!

A lot of really good points already mentioned. I agree just make sure you are in a good environment, you don't want to enhance your issues and have a plan for when you finally get high especially it being your first time. Coloring high is a personal go to if you want, it's very relaxing and fun!
How did it taste sweet wise? I'm tempted to try something like this since all the breads at my local market have crazy amounts of HFCS and other processed sweeteners. Is it bitter or bland?
...Looks.....good...
